code: @Test public void testCamelInvokesMessageListener() throws Exception {     template.sendBody("direct:start", expectedBody).     Message message = messageListener.message.     assertNotNull("Should have invoked the message listener!", message).     TextMessage textMessage = assertIsInstanceOf(TextMessage.class, message).     assertEquals("body", expectedBody, textMessage.getText()). }

@Override protected RouteBuilder createRouteBuilder() throws Exception {     return new RouteBuilder() {          public void configure() throws Exception {             from("direct:start").bean(messageListener).         }     }. }
public void onMessage(Message message) {     this.message = message. }
